title: Wall Pilates Beginner Workout | 28 Day Wall Pilates Challenge- Day 1
description:
Wall Pilates Beginner Workout | Pilates Workout NO Equipment

#pilatesworkout  #pilatesabs  #pilatesathome  

28 Day Wall Pilates Youtube challenge calendar (free): https://rachelsfitpilates.myflodesk.com/28daywallpilatesyoutubechallenge

See the intro video: 
28 Day Wall Pilates Challenge: https://youtu.be/CpO-oY4fpiQ?si=OjHkY71sm5tmY4ui

Exclusive discounts: 
Want to see how many calories you burn in your workout?  See my exclusive link to get a Whoop (First month free + Band included!  https://www.join.whoop.com/en-US/rachelsfitpilates .. tracks calories burned, sleep, recovery)


Have a weight loss goal? Try Carbon Macro Coach with 5% off subscription using my link below: https://web.joincarbon.com/?via=rachel


Level: Beginner

This is a wall pilates beginner workout. This video includes form tips to help you get the most out of the exercises. It is ok to repeat this workout daily, however, the best way for you to build strength is to increase the challenge placed on your muscles over time. You can do this by repeating this workout for an additional round or 2, adding ankle weights, or completing another video after this. If you are interested in completing the 28 Day Wall Pilates Challenge, you can find it on my main YouTube page.  

I hope you enjoy this workout!


Timestamps:
00:00 Intro to Wall Pilates and Warmup
02:30 Glutes and ab exercises
14:08 Thank you for joining me!

DISCLAIMER: 
Check with your doctor before beginning any fitness program. Should you experience pain or discomfort at any time while performing the exercises, you should stop immediately. By performing these exercises, you understand and agree that Rachel's Fit Pilates LLC will not be responsible or liable for any injury or harm you may sustain as a result of exercises performed in these videos.  

Music: www.epidemicsound.com

https://www.instagram.com/rachelsfitpilates

I create Pilates & Strength Workouts to increase strength & improve aesthetics 💪🏽
Where to start:
Start with my free Challenges, then follow the free Monthly Calendars! 

For Beginners Mat Pilates-Inspired/Strength:
Start with 7 Day Pilates for Weight Loss, then  ➡️ 
28 Day Pilates for Weight Loss+Strength ➡️ 

Intermediate level: 
28 Day Pilates x Strength (Intermediate) ➡️ 
Join our Intermediate Monthly Calendar

For Beginner Wall Pilates (mat & reformer exercises adapted for the wall):
Start with 14 Day Wall Pilates, then ➡️ 
28 Day Wall Pilates ➡️ Join our monthly Wall Pilates Calendar

Scroll down to “Links” for FREE PDF Calendars

*My routines are intended for those with strength & weight loss goals. If your goal is to improve in your classical or contemporary Pilates practice, I'd be happy to recommend other workouts.

By Rachel-
•B.Sc in Kinesiology 
•STOTT Pilates Instructor
•Licensed Occupational Therapist (M.S., OTR/L)
& mid 30’s Mom of 2 👦🏻

STEPS TO START THE FREE 28 Day WALL PILATES YOUTUBE CHALLENGE:
1. Go to my main page & hit SUBSCRIBE (it's free to subscribe)
https://www.youtube.com/@rachelsfitpilates
2. Download and/or print the FREE Printable PDF Wall Pilates 28 Youtube challenge PDF:

https://rachelsfitpilates.myflodesk.com/28daywallpilatesyoutubechallenge

3. Click the picture on the plan to be redirected to your video of the day on YouTube, or go to my page and scroll down to see “28 Day Wall Pilates Challenge” section to begin Day 1 video & all videos located by day.

Came here as I wanted to do a free version of a 28 day wall pilates challenge. Thank you.

Moved to a new country by myself a year ago. Started some bad eating habits and gained 20lbs… now I’m in a bad mental state about my body. Decided it’s time to do something about it! Today is my day one!
I'm a mom of 4, my starting weight is 320 and I just finished my first day of wall Pilates. I have lower back issues and nerve damage but I did the exercises to the best of my abilities 😊

Finished the first-set of  28-day challenge; 7-day intermediate challenge; and now I’m on my next 7-day challenge. I’m so glad I found your channel; thanks for providing 100% free workout videos without any gimmicks.  My abs  and legs are looking amazing.
